headline: Martin Marietta Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: RALEIGH, N.C., Feb. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (NYSE: MLM) (“Martin Marietta” or the “Company”) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.79 per share on the Company’s outstanding common stock. This dividend will be payable on March 31, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 3, 2025. Martin Marietta, a member of the S&P 500 Index, is an American-based company and a leading supplier

headline: Gibraltar's Q4 Earnings Top Estimates While Sales Miss, Stock Up
summary: ROCK's fourth-quarter 2024 results reflect bottom-line growth and top-line decline. Read more to learn about the factors molding the quarter's performance.
